channel.title: Half-Life fan media
channel.description:
Thought it might be fun if we share some of the different half-life series related fan-made media on the internet right now.
Here's my contribution: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IU_reTt7Hj4&feature=player_embedded[/url]
Its not exactly about half-life, but it borrows a lot of the sound effects from HL2 and has a similar theme (at least, I think so).
Feel free to mention obvious ones like Escape from City 17, Freeman's Mind, and the comic about Gordon Frohman (whatever its called). I'd like to see what you've heard of.
Also, I'm not sure if this type of thread exists already or not (if it does, just delete this thread and point me in the right direction). Thanks.

item.title: Half-Life fan media
item.dc:creator: Frozen_Cham
item.description:
Escape from that motherstrider city 17!?!
It has destroy my trust already

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life fan media
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
Holy crap… I don’t see how I could have missed Whats in the box. Its nothing short of awesome visually, especially Part 3. Any idea if there’s gonna be a part 4?

Oh, and a must-read comic about HL2 (I know its old, but it belongs in this thread anyway):
https://www.hlcomic.com/

Read full topic

item.title: Half-Life fan media
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
russilker:

Here’s my contribution:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IU_reTt7Hj4&feature=player_embedded

Here is part 2 of Whats in the Box:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bIlEQWSAjHs&feature=related

And I bet you guys don’t know the third part of Whats in the box

Part 3 is fucking awesome, and owns everything:

https://babel-research.eu/129/222/315.html
